title: Emprez BI Module - Index Emprez
content: ðŸ’¡Â Index EmprezÂ is an anonymous comparison of your company's data to other companies in the same group as yours,Â registered in Emprez.Thus you can compare your performance to similar companies for a fairer comparison.If the discrepancy between your data and that of the Emprez index is really significant, there may be an error in the use of the application, here are some suggestions:Consult the article Approving Timesheets to see the best practicesIn order not to distort the numbers, you can also disable some employees (temporary employees, admin, managers for those who should not clock in) so that they are not taken into account by Emprez BI.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
